ready:
Why did the JavaScript function go to therapy?
Because it had too many unresolved events and wasn’t ready for commitment!

How do JavaScript developers greet each other?
"Are you ready or just waiting for the DOM to load?"

Why did the JavaScript developer go broke?
Because he used up all his cache!

Why did the JavaScript developer leave?
Because he didn’t get arrays!

Why did the JavaScript developer go to therapy?
Because he didn’t know how to deal with callbacks!

What do you call a function that's always ready to go?
A "pre-function-al"!

How do you know a JavaScript developer is always prepared?
They’re always ready for the next event!
When your father told you that there is a brand new framework: :(
